games.name: Rock Paper Scissor
games.description:
Game suit / batu gunting kertas online multiplayer

How To Play :

Pilih batu/gunting/kertas.


Permainan akan berlangsung selama 3 ronde.

games.name: Super Mario 64 (1996)
games.description:
Super Mario 64 ported to JavaScript and WebAssembly via Emscripten.


How To Play :

Click start game to play


Arrow keys = Move

W,A,S,D = Camera Control

X key = Jump,Read Dialogue,Select Option

C key = Grab,Throw,Punch

Spacebar = Croach,Crawl,Ground Pound

Enter = Pause,Start

games.name: Pacman 3D
games.description:
Nostalgic pacman game. But in 3D !

How To Play :

W,A,S,D to move

games.name: T-Rex Run 3D
games.description:
3D version of No Internet T-Rex game using THREE.js


How To Play :

Arrow Left and Right to move

Spacebar to pause
